details.text: The Coding provided (http://ihe.net/fhir/ihe.formatcode.fhir/CodeSystem/formatcode#urn:ihe:iti:xds:2017:mimeTypeSufficient) was not found in the value set 'DocumentReference Format Code Set' (http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/formatcodes|4.0.1), and a code is recommended to come from this value set.  (error message = The provided code 'http://ihe.net/fhir/ihe.formatcode.fhir/CodeSystem/formatcode#urn:ihe:iti:xds:2017:mimeTypeSufficient: 'Format aus MIME Type ableitbar'' was not found in the value set 'http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/formatcodes|4.0.1'; Wrong Display Name 'Format aus MIME Type ableitbar' for http://ihe.net/fhir/ihe.formatcode.fhir/CodeSystem/formatcode#urn:ihe:iti:xds:2017:mimeTypeSufficient.
